com.defano.jmonet.model

Interface Quadrilateral

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FixedQuadrilateral, FlexQuadrilateral

    public interface Quadrilateral
    A four-sided, simple polygon (quadrilateral) with no restrictions on the length, angle or parallelism, except that the shape's edges cannot cross each other (self-intersecting quadrilaterals are disallowed).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default int getBottom()
      The bottom-most point of the quadrilateral.
      Point getBottomLeft()
      Gets the bottom-left corner of this quadrilateral.
      default Line2D getBottomLeftTopRightDiagonal()
      Gets the diagonal line formed by getBottomLeft() and getTopRight().
      default Line2D getBottomLine()
      Gets the line formed by getBottomLeft() and getBottomRight().
      Point getBottomRight()
      Gets the bottom-right corner of this quadrilateral.
      default Line2D getBottomRightTopLeftDiagonal()
      Gets the diagonal line formed by getBottomRight() and getTopLeft().
      default Point getCenter()
      Gets the center-point of the bounds of this shape.
      default Point[] getCorners()
      Gets a four-element array of Point representing the top-left, top-right, bottom-right and bottom-left corners of the quadrilateral, in that order.
      default int getHeight()
      The height of the quadrilateral.
      default int getLeft()
      The left-most point of the quadrilateral.
      default Line2D getLeftLine()
      Gets the line formed by getTopLeft() and getBottomLeft().
      default int getRight()
      The right-most point of the quadrilateral.
      default Line2D getRightLine()
      Gets the line formed by getTopRight() and getBottomRight().
      default Shape getShape()
      Gets a Shape from this Quadrilateral.
      default int getTop()
      The top-most point of the quadrilateral.
      Point getTopLeft()
      Gets the top-left corner of this quadrilateral.
      default Line2D getTopLeftBottomRightDiagonal()
      Gets the diagonal line formed by getTopLeft() and getBottomRight().
      default Line2D getTopLine()
      Gets the line formed by getTopLeft() and getTopRight().
      Point getTopRight()
      Gets the top-right corner of this quadrilateral.
      default Line2D getTopRightBottomLeftDiagonal()
      Gets the diagonal line formed by getTopRight() and getBottomLeft().
      default int getWidth()
      The width of the quadrilateral.
